title: MD
biography: The National Games of India consist of various disciplines in which athletes from the different states of India participate against each other. The country's first few Olympic Games, now renamed as National Games, were held in Lahore, Delhi, Allahabad, Patiala, Madras, Calcutta and Bombay.
aiSummary: S. K. Basu is a medicine specialist with an H-index of 72 at Lipid biology (Member). Has been published in Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
